name: Gluf
overview: Hop right up to the most electrifying frog in the universe and navigate through 30 levels of amphibious platform puzzles. Whether it's spine-tingling terror from the Royal Boo's spookish attacks, or the Googantuan Slime's slippery touch, the only hope for escape is your webbed wit and patience. Gluf brings a hyper-cat-ual ribbiting experience for fans of all ages, from gentlemanly Tesla Frog enthusiasts to pixel aficionados.
